column4: whenever i try to boot ubuntu from the menu on the CD the text 'loading' appears, and it just stops. the mennu doesnt disappear
i burned the iso from the website (ubun)
whenever i try to boot ubuntu from the menu on the CD the text 'loading' appears, and it just stops. the mennu doesnt disappear
maybe you don't have enough RAM?
but when it freeze? after "instal on run live cd"?
i press Start or install Ubuntu, the text loading appears in top right, and then it hangs. the menu doesnt dissappear
maybe you must use some special boot commands? i don't know
